game.name: Infinite Void
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Embark on an endless cosmic odyssey in Infinite Void! Master retro-inspired space shoot 'em up gameplay with procedurally generated universes, dynamic upgrades, & simple controls. Every run offers a unique challenge. Will you conquer the "Infinite Void" or succumb to its celestial challenges?
